name: skill:Utility_Table
description: Creates and handles a table-like data structure.

name: table
attributes.description: The table to be used.

name: mode
attributes.description: The mode to be used.

name: key
attributes.description: The key to be used in the table.

name: value
attributes.description: The value to be used in the table.

name: index
attributes.description: The index to use, if the operation supports it.

name: elementskill
attributes.description: The skill to execute for each element of the table.

name: key1
attributes.description: The first key to be used in the compare or exchange operation.

name: key2
attributes.description: The second key to be used in the compare or exchange operation.

name: skill:GetEpoch
description: Retrieves the current epoch time.

name: skill:Utility_ForceLeash_Set
description: This metaskill will forcefully leash the caster of the mechanic to the inherited target.

name: skill:Utility_ForceLeash_Remove
description: This metaskill will remove the forcefully applied leash

name: skill:Utility_ForceLeashFramework
description:
This metaskill is an already configured framework to handle the leashing of an entity.
Execute it ~onInteract

name: skill:Utility_ForceLeashFramework_MEG
description: This metaskill is a configured framework to handle the leashing of a MEG modeled entity. Execute this ~onInteract

name: mid
attributes.description: The modelid of the casting modeled entity.

name: pid
attributes.description: The partid of the leash bone you want to graphically see leashed.

name: skill:Utility_Freeze
description: This metaskill allows you to freeze a player for a set amount of ticks.

name: duration
attributes.description: The duration of the freeze effect.

name: damage
attributes.description: The damage inflicted every damage instance.

name: skill:Utility_GetDistance
description: Gets the actual distance between the caster and the target, and stores it inside <skill.var.Utility_GetDistance>.

name: skill:Utility_GetDistance_Raw
description: Gets the distance between the caster and the target without squaring it, and stores it inside <skill.var.Utility_GetDistance_Raw>. Useful for performance concerns.

name: skill:Utility_GetDistance_x
description: Gets the distance between the caster and the target on the x axis and stores it inside <skill.var.Utility_GetDistance_x>.

name: skill:Utility_GetDistance_y
description: Gets the distance between the caster and the target on the y axis and stores it inside <skill.var.Utility_GetDistance_y>.

name: skill:Utility_GetDistance_z
description: Gets the distance between the caster and the target on the z axis and stores it inside <skill.var.Utility_GetDistance_z>.

name: skill:Utility_GetDistance_Weighted
description: Gets the distance between the caster and the target and stores it inside <skill.var.Utility_GetDistance_Weighted>. The distance on each axis is first multiplied by a skill parameter (the weight).

name: x
attributes.description: The value for which the x distance will be multiplied.

name: y
attributes.description: The value for which the y distance will be multiplied.

name: z
attributes.description: The value for which the z distance will be multiplied.

name: skill:Utility_IncreaseItemStack
description: Increases the amount of items of the dropped item entity by 1.

name: skill:Utility_DecreaseItemStack
description: Decreases the amount of items of the dropped item entity by 1.

name: skill:Utility_ChangeItemStack
description: Changes the amount of items of the dropped item entity. The amount and the operation can be specified.

name: amount
attributes.description: The amount of the operation.

name: operation
attributes.description: The type of operation. Can be +, -, *, /, %

name: skill:MountEventManager
description: Simulates onMount and onDismount events for an entity.

name: mount
attributes.description: The metaskill to execute when the entity is mounted.

name: dismount
attributes.description: The metaskill to execute when the entity is dismounted.

name: d
attributes.description: The duration used as the onTimer interval.

name: skill:Utility_Relocation_Align
description: This skill allows to lower a mob until it is aligned with a given plane.

name: m
attributes.description: The mode of the Alignment. Can be GROUND or SEAFLOOR.

name: p
attributes.description: The number of blocks the entity will be moved on the y axis every iteration. Using a positive value will invert the effect.

name: d
attributes.description: The number of ticks to wait between each iteration.

name: skill:Utility_TeleportCloser
description: Teleports the caster closer to the inherited location by a specified distance.

name: distance
attributes.description: The distance to teleport the caster closer to the target location.

name: skill:Utility_String_FormatHealth
description: Formats the target's health into a text format and saves it inside <skill.var.return>.

name: skill:Utility_String_FormatValue
description: Formats a number into a more succinct text format and saves it inside <skill.var.return>.

name: value
attributes.description: The number to format.

name: skill:Utility_String_GenerateProgressBar
description: Generates a progress bar string based on the given parameters.

name: value
attributes.description: The value of the progress bar.

name: maxvalue
attributes.description: The maximum value that can be reached.

name: segments
attributes.description: The number of segments in the progress bar.

name: segmentstring
attributes.description: The string used to represent a single segment.

name: startstring
attributes.description: The string used at the start of the progress bar.

name: startcolor
attributes.description: The color code that will be put at the start.

name: endstring
attributes.description: The string used at the end of the progress bar.

name: colorswitch
attributes.description: The string to be applied before the segment when the color needs to change.

name: colorswitchmath
attributes.description: An additional operation to determine where to apply a colorswitch.

name: extra
attributes.description: If set to any non-0 value, extra variables will be generated.

name: iterationskill
attributes.description: The metaskill to run for each iteration.

name: colorswitchskill
attributes.description: The metaskill to run when the colorswitch is applied.

name: skill:Utility_GenerateCooldownBar
description: Generates a cooldown bar string based on the given parameters and stores it inside <skill.var.Utility_GenerateCooldownBar>.

name: centervalue
attributes.description: The string to display at the center of the generated string.

name: value
attributes.description: The value of the progress bar.

name: maxvalue
attributes.description: The maximum value that can be reached.

name: segments
attributes.description: The number of segments in the progress bar.

name: segmentstring
attributes.description: The string used to represent a single segment.

name: startstring
attributes.description: The string used at the start of the progress bar.

name: startcolor
attributes.description: The color code that will be put at the start.

name: endstring
attributes.description: The string used at the end of the progress bar.

name: colorswitch
attributes.description: The string to be applied before the segment when the color needs to change.

name: colorswitchmath
attributes.description: An additional operation to determine where to apply a colorswitch.

name: extra
attributes.description: If set to any non-0 value, extra variables will be generated.

name: iterationskill
attributes.description: The metaskill to run for each iteration.

name: colorswitchskill
attributes.description: The metaskill to run when the colorswitch is applied.
